meanings.definition: A painful swelling filled with pus on the gum.
meanings.sent1: The gumboil caused a lot of pain in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist treated the gumboil with antibiotics.
meanings.sent3: The gumboil made it hard to eat my favorite foods.
meanings.sent4: The gumboil felt like a tiny volcano erupting in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing gumboil was a constant reminder of my dental issue.

meanings.sent1: If you don't take care of your teeth, you may gumboil.
meanings.sent2: She gumboiled after neglecting her oral hygiene.
meanings.sent3: I hope I don't gumboil before my dental appointment.
meanings.sent4: Neglecting dental care can lead to gumboiling.
meanings.sent5: The lack of brushing and flossing can cause gums to gumboil.
